verses.verse: Now these are the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that went up <S%H5927><s%> with Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, and Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>: Seraiah <S%H8304><s%>, Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, Ezra <S%H5830><s%>,
Amariah <S%H568><s%>, Malluch <S%H4409><s%>, Hattush <S%H2407><s%>,
Shecaniah <S%H7935><s%>, Rehum <S%H7348><s%>, Meremoth <S%H4822><s%>,
Iddo <S%H5714><s%>, Ginnethoi <S%H1599><s%>, Abijah <S%H29><s%>,
Mijamin <S%H4326><s%>, Maadiah <S%H4573><s%>, Bilgah <S%H1083><s%>,
Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Joiarib <S%H3114><s%>, Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>.

Sallu <S%H5543><s%>, Amok <S%H5987><s%>, Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>. These were the chiefs <S%H7218><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and of their brethren <S%H251><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>.

Moreover the Levites <S%H3881><s%>: Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, Binnui <S%H1131><s%>, Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, who was over the thanksgiving <S%H1960><s%>, he and his brethren <S%H251><s%>.
Also Bakbukiah <S%H1229><s%> and Unno <S%H6042><s%>, their brethren <S%H251><s%>, were over against them according to their offices <S%H4931><s%>.

And Jeshua <S%H3442><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Joiakim <S%H3113><s%>, and Joiakim <S%H3113><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Eliashib <S%H475><s%>, and Eliashib <S%H475><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Joiada <S%H3111><s%>,
and Joiada <S%H3111><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>, and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jaddua <S%H3037><s%>.

And in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joiakim <S%H3113><s%> were priests <S%H3548><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H8304><s%>: of Seraiah, Meraiah <S%H4811><s%>; of Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>;
of Ezra <S%H5830><s%>, Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>; of Amariah <S%H568><s%>, Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%>;
of Malluchi <S%H4409><s%>, Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>; of Shebaniah <S%H7645><s%>, Joseph <S%H3130><s%>;
of Harim <S%H2766><s%>, Adna <S%H5733><s%>; of Meraioth <S%H4812><s%>, Helkai <S%H2517><s%>;
of Iddo <S%H5714><s%>, Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>; of Ginnethon <S%H1599><s%>, Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>;
of Abijah <S%H29><s%>, Zichri <S%H2147><s%>; of Miniamin <S%H4509><s%>, of Moadiah <S%H4153><s%>, Piltai <S%H6408><s%>;
of Bilgah <S%H1083><s%>, Shammua <S%H8051><s%>; of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, Jehonathan <S%H3083><s%>;
and of Joiarib <S%H3114><s%>, Mattenai <S%H4982><s%>; of Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>, Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>;
of Sallai <S%H5543><s%>, Kallai <S%H7040><s%>; of Amok <S%H5987><s%>, Eber <S%H5677><s%>;
of Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>; of Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>, Nethanel <S%H5417><s%>.

As for the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%>, Joiada <S%H3111><s%>, and Johanan <S%H3110><s%>, and Jaddua <S%H3037><s%>, there were recorded <S%H3789><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H3548><s%>; also the priests, in the reign <S%H4438><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%> the Persian <S%H6542><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H3789><s%>, were written in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%>, even until the days <S%H3117><s%> of Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%>.

And the chiefs <S%H7218><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>: Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, and Jeshua <S%H3442><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, with their brethren <S%H251><s%> over against them <S%H1984><s%>, to praise and give thanks <S%H3034><s%>, according to the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, watch <S%H4929><s%> next <S%H5980><s%> to watch <S%H4929><s%>.

Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, and Bakbukiah <S%H1229><s%>, Obadiah <S%H5662><s%>, Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, Talmon <S%H2929><s%>, Akkub <S%H6126><s%>, were porters <S%H7778><s%> keeping <S%H8104><s%> the watch <S%H4929><s%> at the store-houses <S%H624><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%>.

These were in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joiakim <S%H3113><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jozadak <S%H3136><s%>, and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%> the governor <S%H6346><s%>, and of Ezra <S%H5830><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> the scribe <S%H5608><s%>.

And at the dedication <S%H2598><s%> of the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> they sought <S%H1245><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> out of all their places <S%H4725><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> them to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, to keep <S%H6213><s%> the dedication <S%H2598><s%> with gladness <S%H8057><s%>, both with thanksgivings <S%H8426><s%>, and with singing <S%H7892><s%>, with cymbals <S%H4700><s%>, psalteries <S%H5035><s%>, and with harps <S%H3658><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the singers <S%H7891><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H622><s%>, both out of the plain <S%H3603><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and from the villages <S%H2691><s%> of the Netophathites <S%H5200><s%>;

also from Beth <S%H1004><s%> - gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, and out of the fields <S%H7704><s%> of Geba <S%H1387><s%> and Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%>: for the singers <S%H7891><s%> had builded <S%H1129><s%> them villages <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> purified <S%H2891><s%> themselves <S%H2891><s%>; and they purified the people <S%H5971><s%>, and the gates <S%H8179><s%>, and the wall <S%H2346><s%>.

Then I brought up <S%H5927><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> upon the wall <S%H2346><s%>, and appointed <S%H5975><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> companies that gave thanks <S%H8426><s%> and went in procession <S%H8418><s%>; whereof one went on the right hand <S%H3225><s%> upon the wall <S%H2346><s%> toward the dung <S%H830><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>:
and after <S%H310><s%> them went <S%H3212><s%> Hoshaiah <S%H1955><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> of the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>,
and Azariah <S%H5838><s%>, Ezra <S%H5830><s%>, and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>,
Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, and Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>,

and certain of the priests <S%H3548><s%>' sons <S%H1121><s%> with trumpets <S%H2689><s%>: Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3129><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Micaiah <S%H4320><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccur <S%H2139><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>;

and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Azarel <S%H5832><s%>, Milalai <S%H4450><s%>, Gilalai <S%H1562><s%>, Maai <S%H4597><s%>, Nethanel <S%H5417><s%>, and Judah <S%H3063><s%>, Hanani <S%H2607><s%>, with the musical <S%H7892><s%> instruments <S%H3627><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; and Ezra <S%H5830><s%> the scribe <S%H5608><s%> was before them <S%H6440><s%>.

And by the fountain <S%H5869><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, and straight before them <S%H5927><s%>, they went up by the stairs <S%H4609><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, at the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of the wall <S%H2346><s%>, above the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, even unto the water <S%H4325><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> company of them that gave thanks <S%H8426><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H4136><s%> them <S%H310><s%>, and I after them <S%H2677><s%>, with the half of the people <S%H5971><s%>, upon the wall <S%H2346><s%>, above the tower <S%H4026><s%> of the furnaces <S%H8574><s%>, even unto the broad <S%H7342><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%>,

and above the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and by the old <S%H3465><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, and by the fish <S%H1709><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, and the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hananel <S%H2606><s%>, and the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hammeah <S%H3968><s%>, even unto the sheep <S%H6629><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>: and they stood still <S%H5975><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the guard <S%H4307><s%>.

So stood <S%H5975><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> companies of them that gave thanks <S%H8426><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and I <S%H2677><s%>, and the half of the rulers with me <S%H5461><s%>;

and the priests <S%H3548><s%>, Eliakim <S%H471><s%>, Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, Miniamin <S%H4509><s%>, Micaiah <S%H4320><s%>, Elioenai <S%H454><s%>, Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, and Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, with trumpets <S%H2689><s%>;

and Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, and Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>, and Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%>, and Malchijah <S%H4441><s%>, and Elam <S%H5867><s%>, and Ezer <S%H5829><s%>. And the singers <S%H7891><s%> sang loud <S%H8085><s%>, with Jezrahiah <S%H3156><s%> their overseer <S%H6496><s%>.

And they offered <S%H2076><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>, and rejoiced <S%H8055><s%>; for God <S%H430><s%> had made them rejoice <S%H8055><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%>; and the women <S%H802><s%> also and the children <S%H3206><s%> rejoiced <S%H8055><s%>: so that the joy <S%H8057><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was heard <S%H8085><s%> even afar off <S%H7350><s%>.

And on that day <S%H3117><s%> were men <S%H582><s%> appointed <S%H6485><s%> over the chambers <S%H5393><s%> for the treasures <S%H214><s%>, for the heave-offerings <S%H8641><s%>, for the first-fruits <S%H7225><s%>, and for the tithes <S%H4643><s%>, to gather <S%H3664><s%> into them <S%H7704><s%>, according to the fields of the cities <S%H5892><s%>, the portions <S%H4521><s%> appointed by the law <S%H8451><s%> for the priests <S%H3548><s%> and Levites <S%H3881><s%>: for Judah <S%H3063><s%> rejoiced <S%H8057><s%> for the priests <S%H3548><s%> and for the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that waited <S%H5975><s%>.

And they kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their God <S%H430><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the purification <S%H2893><s%>, and so did the singers <S%H7891><s%> and the porters <S%H7778><s%>, according to the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, and of Solomon <S%H8010><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

For in the days <S%H3117><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and Asaph <S%H623><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%> there was a chief <S%H7218><s%> of the singers <S%H7891><s%>, and songs <S%H7892><s%> of praise <S%H8416><s%> and thanksgiving <S%H3034><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>.

And all Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>, and in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%>, gave <S%H5414><s%> the portions <S%H4521><s%> of the singers <S%H7891><s%> and the porters <S%H7778><s%>, as every day <S%H3117><s%> required <S%H1697><s%>: and they set apart <S%H6942><s%> that which was for the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> set apart <S%H6942><s%> that which was for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>.
